channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AI layoffs or ‘AI-washing’?
item.description: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?

item.title: Apex Legends won't be playable on Nintendo Switch after its next season
item.description: Apex Legends developer Respawn said it's ending Nintendo Switch support for the game this summer, with the release of Season 30. After that point, it'll work with the Switch 2 and all other currently supported platforms, but not the original Switch. "Season 29 will be the final update for Apex Legends on Nintendo Switch," the team wrote in a post on X.Hey legends, we want to share an important update about Apex Legends on the Nintendo Switch. Season 29 will be the final update for Apex Legends on Nintendo Switch. Future seasons of Apex Legends will continue to be available on Nintendo Switch 2...

item.title: There's a sneaky way to watch Zuffa Boxing 2 for FREE
item.description: We uncovered a sneaky way to watch Zuffa Boxing 2 for free — without splashing all your cash on a Paramount+ subscription.

item.title: Shock report claims Android apps have leaked over 730TB of user data and Google secrets - here are some of the worst offenders around
item.description: Study of Android AI apps uncovers widespread hardcoded secrets exposing cloud infrastructure payment systems and nearly 730TB of user data

item.title: European Tech Giant Cuts Off U.S. Subsidiary After Multimillion Dollar ICE Contract
item.description: ICE is enlisting ten companies for a widespread immigrant surveillance program.

item.title: ‘Upgrade’ Producer Dishes On the TV Sequel That Almost Was
item.description: The cult classic 'Upgrade' almost got a continuation with a TV show, but real-world events kept getting in its way.

item.title: Emails Show Even Epstein Thought Crypto Pumps are Unethical
item.description: In 2018, Epstein wrote that because he is "high profile" he had concerns about the "questionable ethics" of crypto pumps if he was involved.

item.title: Samsung's QN90F is our favorite TV for sports — and the 65-Inch Model Is $1,000 off ahead of the Super Bowl
item.description: Samsung's QN90F QLED is TechRadar's best TV for watching sports, and the 65-inch model is on sale for its lowest price yet ahead of the Super Bowl.

item.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
item.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.
